io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.physics

Class PhysicsSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.itch.jaknak72.oozed.game.physics.PhysicsSystem

  • public class PhysicsSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all Bounding boxes, checks collisions between them offers methods for collision checks, raycasts and sweeps
    Author:
    simon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PhysicsSystem.Contact
      Contact object describing a collision between two objects Contact objects are only valid for 1 frame, since they get reused
      static class  PhysicsSystem.Sweep
      Represents a sweep result from a sweep test Sweep objects are only valid for 1 frame since they get reused

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<AABB>[] aabbByLayer 
      private ObjectPool<PhysicsSystem.Contact> contactPool 
      Subject<PhysicsSystem.Contact> onGlobalCollision 
      private ObjectPool<PhysicsSystem.Sweep> sweepPool 
      private static java.lang.String TAG 
      private java.util.ArrayList<PhysicsSystem.Contact> usedContacts
      Contacts that are generated during collision events and used outside the physics system, these get cleared at the beginning of each physics step
      private java.util.ArrayList<PhysicsSystem.Sweep> usedSweeps
      Sweeps that are returned when calling a public sweep function, these get cleared at the beginning of each physics step

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhysicsSystem() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAABB(AABB box)
      Adds given box to the physics system
      void init()
      Called once by game
      private PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb, AABB other, Vec2 move)
      Performs a sweep of aabb against other
      PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb, Vec2 move)
      Performs a sweep against all other aabbs, that are in the collision mask of the given aabb
      PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb, Vec2 move, short mask)
      Performs a sweep check against all objects of given layers (mask)
      private PhysicsSystem.Contact raycast(Vec2 position, Vec2 ray, AABB aabb, float paddingX, float paddingY)
      Performs a raycast against given aabb with given padding
      PhysicsSystem.Contact raycast(Vec2 position, Vec2 ray, short mask)
      Performs a raycast against all objects specified by given mask and returns the first collision
      private float raycast1D(float pos, float ray, float aabbPos, float aabbHalfSize, float padding) 
      void removeAABB(AABB box)
      removes given box from the physics system
      private PhysicsSystem.Contact testCollision(AABB a, AABB b)
      Tests whether or not the two given aabbs collide with each other and generates a contact object in that case inspired by: https://noonat.github.io/intersect/ https://gamedev.docrobs.co.uk/first-steps-in-pico-8-hitting-things
      void update() 
      void updateAABB(AABB box)
      Should be called when the collision mask or layer changes

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • update

        public void update()

      • testCollision

        private PhysicsSystem.Contact testCollision(AABB a,
                                            AABB b)
        Tests whether or not the two given aabbs collide with each other and generates a contact object in that case inspired by: https://noonat.github.io/intersect/ https://gamedev.docrobs.co.uk/first-steps-in-pico-8-hitting-things
        Parameters:
        a, - !=null
        b, - !=null
        Returns:
        null, if there is no collision, a contact object obtained from the contact pool from the view of a

      • raycast

        public PhysicsSystem.Contact raycast(Vec2 position,
                                     Vec2 ray,
                                     short mask)
        Performs a raycast against all objects specified by given mask and returns the first collision
        Parameters:
        position - origin of ray
        ray - describes length and direction of ray
        mask -
        Returns:
        the first contact or null if there was no contact

      • raycast

        private PhysicsSystem.Contact raycast(Vec2 position,
                                      Vec2 ray,
                                      AABB aabb,
                                      float paddingX,
                                      float paddingY)
        Performs a raycast against given aabb with given padding
        Parameters:
        position, - origin of ray
        ray, - describes length and direction of ray
        aabb, - !=null
        paddingX -
        paddingY -
        Returns:
        null if there is no collision, otherwise a contact object with contact.box set to null, contact.other=aabb, the contact is not marked as used

      • raycast1D

        private float raycast1D(float pos,
                        float ray,
                        float aabbPos,
                        float aabbHalfSize,
                        float padding)
        Returns:
        >1 for no collision, otherwise 0-1 to describe the time of the collision

      • move

        public PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb,
                                Vec2 move)
        Performs a sweep against all other aabbs, that are in the collision mask of the given aabb

      • move

        public PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb,
                                Vec2 move,
                                short mask)
        Performs a sweep check against all objects of given layers (mask)
        Returns:
        sweep, registered as used by the physics system

      • move

        private PhysicsSystem.Sweep move(AABB aabb,
                                 AABB other,
                                 Vec2 move)
        Performs a sweep of aabb against other
        Parameters:
        move, - describes move of aabb, !=null
        Returns:
        sweep, not registered as used
